product_name: WD-40 BIKE Wet Chain Bike Lube - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: Professionally tested and amped up for premium lubrication, the 4 fl. oz. bottle of WD-40 BIKE Wet Chain bike lube is designed to keep your components smoothly operating in wet and muddy conditions. The WD-40 BIKE Wet Chain bike lube improves shifting and extends chain life by repelling moisture and gunk.
short_description: Professionally tested and amped up for premium lubrication, the 4 fl. oz. bottle of WD-40 BIKE Wet Chain bike lube is designed to keep your components smoothly operating in wet and muddy conditions.
